channel.title: Fsx
channel.description:
Hey all
Well I've been playing FSX for quite some time now and.. well I'm still pretty terrible. I mainly do short flights for example Tirana to Fiumicinio or cleveland to detroit. I usually set it on autopilot and leave it on until landing. Anyways I want to be a commercial pilot when I grow up and eventually become the pilot. But anyways where do you think I could find some guides on getting better? Also your opinions on it etc etc.

item.title: Fsx
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

i dunno about tremendous you might get a halfhour jump on them in the first lesson by knowing the basics of flight, i guess

Read full topic

item.title: Fsx
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:302254”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=398579.msg2958755#msg2958755 date=1253024074]
i know where his problem lies

assuming fsx will help him become a pilot >=)
[/quote]

I was thinking the same thing.[/quote]

Wouldn’t it give him a tremendous advantage over other student pilots?

Read full topic

item.title: Fsx
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Man UTD Freak:

I just played FSX (Trial Version) for the first time ever and I have to say it is much harder than I thought it would be, especially the landing part to say the least.

The only thing I got down in that game is taxing and taking off. I also can find my way around to the airport through IFR but then I completely fuck up the landing or lose sight of the runway. If I get lucky enough I just flare at 50ft or so and make it

Read full topic

I’m not planning to become a pilot through fsx lol. I’m going to aviation high school soon enough. I was just trying to figure out how to play the game…:s

item.title: Fsx
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Do you have a decent Joystick? I don’t, so I have to fly with the keyboard. I can actually land and takeoff with it, but sometimes the plane gets out of control and then correcting it isn’t easy with a keyboard.

I don’t know where your problems lie, but landing isn’t that hard. Just get the nose up a bit so you land with your main landing gear, and then slow down. Ofc, use your flaps before you land.

Read full topic

item.title: Fsx
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Practice a lot, maybe join a VATSIM like thing and look for someone to help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Fsx
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Davidude:

Tried the lessons/missions that comes with fsx? They aren’t too bad and some of the missions actually are pretty fun.

Yeah I’ve done only 1 advanced one so far tho :\

But I love the Caribbean one

Read full topic
